name: 2023-2024 Desk Calendar, 18 Month Desk Calendar/Wall Calendar Combo, 17" x 12", January 2023-June 2024, Highlight Holidays, Planning Calendar, Thick Paper
short_description: The 2023-2024 desk calendar covers the 18 months from January 2023 to June 2024. It focuses on easy and efficient planning throughout the year to facilitate you to manage a successful life. To improve your life efficiency and organizational skills, the to-do list is a perfect tool to help you make daily plans and write down important things, special events, etc. The use of high-quality paper is durable, ink-proof paper, easy to tear off, with corners to reduce folding pages, and high-quality printing with balanced color inks. It has a wall-hanging function, which realizes the combination of a desk calendar and a wall calendar. The two corners can place the corners of the page clearly and flat on the desktop or wall. It is an excellent tool for long-term planning. 100% satisfied service, so if you have any questions after purchase, you can contact us at any time and we will provide you with a solution.
product_description: Feature Size: 17*12 inches Model Year: 2023-2024 Format: Wall Calendar, Desk Calendar Brand: kyweel Subject: Holidays Material: 100 GSM thick paper Kyweel desk calendar has 18 months, the pages are perforated for easy tearing off. The top is perforated for easy hanging; the bottom has two black corners to keep the page flat when hanging or laying on a tabletop. It's also a great tool for keeping your work and life organized, helping you keep track of appointments, to-dos, reminders, and more. The durable back panel ensures you have a solid writing surface. Details and Features: hanging or tiling There are two round holes at the top of the desk calendar, which can be hung on the wall or used on a desk. Pagination lines allow you to tear off each page easily. It's perfect for school, home or office. two protective corners Two well-designed protective corners prevent page corners from collapsing, allowing you to manage pages more easily. And the lower right corner of the Desk Pad also has a full calendar for the next month, allowing you to see the prospects for the next month at a glance. American holiday markers The desk calendar includes all the important dates and holidays of the year in the United States, so you can plan ahead and never miss a holiday. easy writing The desk calendar features large writeable line squares, an unrivaled 100 GSM thick paper that won't bleed, and a durable backplate that gives you a solid writing surface to write boldly and confidently.

name: Acrylic Dry Erase Calendar for Wall 23”x16“ Clear Acrylic Wall Calendar White Board Calendar Home Office Calendar
short_description: 🖍A CLEAR, MODERN WAY TO ORGANIZE YOUR DAILY LIFE🖍 Our acrylic wall calendar is a futuristically cool decoration for your house. Designed in large size: 23” x 16” to better organize your work and life. 🖍 CLEAR & NO CREASES 🖍 RAXMIN clear acrylic dry erase calendar can fully decorate your wall. Throw away your little agenda book and remove your incongruous whiteboard. This elegant printed text add aesthetics to your life, making it a focal point of your home. 🖍 100% NO GHOSTING 🖍 This acrylic wall calendar board is made from 1/4" thick high-quality acrylic. This kit includes 2 quick-drying markers. These special markers work perfectly with the acrylic board, allow your writings super easy to be wiped off with water even after leaving the writings on the notes for a very long time. Never worry about the stains or ghosting, it is 100% erasable! Just wipe it wet. 🖍 MOUNTING WITH SCREWS ON YOUR WALL 🖍 Drill 1/4" hole in the wall, put in the anchors and screws we provide and you can easily install it. The 6-bolt design ensures that our calendar board more stable and will not bend when writing. 🖍MONTHLY OR WEEKLY CALENDARS🖍 This dry erase calendar has 42 individual squares and 1 large notes area to organize and display your family s school & sports schedules; write meal plans; post billing reminders; make grocery lists; arrange monthly appointments; & write notes of affection!
product_description: Acrylic Dry Erase Calendar for Wall 23”x16“ Clear Acrylic Wall Calendar White Board Calendar Home Office Calendar

short_description: Made in USA: HP Papers is sourced from renewable forest resources and has achieved production with 0% deforestation in North America. Certified sustainable: HP BrightWhite24 printer paper is Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified and contributes toward satisfying credit MR1 under LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design). ColorLok technology printing paper: ColorLok technology provides more vivid colors, bolder blacks and faster drying. Acid free paper: HP BrightWhite24 print and copy paper prevents yellowing over time to ensure a long-lasting appearance for added archival quality.
product_description: HP Papers is a premium line of uncoated printing paper optimized to provide superior print paper performance when used with HP hardware and supplies and in all other makes and models of printing and copying equipment. Launched in 1996, HP Papers are manufactured and marketed exclusively worldwide in over 75 countries by International Paper, a globally recognized leader in paper products, under license from the Hewlett-Packard Company. With a diverse range of products designed to support a wide range of print applications, from everyday copies to full-color presentations, you can be assured of consistent, high-quality print performance every time. HP BrightWhite24 Paper is a 24 lb, super smooth paper that is extra bright (100 bright) and whiter (165 whiteness) than ordinary paper. HP BrightWhite24 empowers inkjet printers to produce their boldest, richest colors. Engineered with ColorLok Technology BrightWhite24 paper provides brighter colors and bolder blacks for great-looking reports, school work and professional business documents. HP BrightWhite24 is available in 8.5 x 11 letter size paper optimized for full-color printing in all inkjet printers and copiers.
